author: jonesde
msg: Related to 990006 the tax calc address code is made more consistent and supported at a lower level by passing in a facilityId when available; this is the order component part and the other commit was the lower level accounting component part

author: jonesde
msg: A few changes to make the code more consistent that determines the address to use for tax calc, especially when there is no shipping address, ie when it is a face-to-face sale
